channel.title: Problem Running My Server
channel.description:
Well, I have absolutely no idea whatsoever why this could have happened.
I was creating a Training area with one of my servers' Head Admins. We were just walking around.. Figuring out where to put NPC's, and all of a sudden he starts to mass Login/Logout, so I decided to reset the server. That didn't work. When I ran the server It gave me this message.
[CODE]WorldObjects.cfg: file not found. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 7 at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2402) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:29) at server.main(server.java:30) ZerkScape V2.0 is ONLINE![/CODE]
It lets you login, but then it just kind of loses connection every couple of seconds.
This is what I usually get when the I have successfully Ran the Server.
[CODE]WorldObjects.cfg: file not found. ZerkScape V2.0 is ONLINE![/CODE]
And now, here are some pictures to give you a clearer view of my problem.
[B]~ PICTURES ~[/B]
[i]When I run the server:[/i]
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/1z2et0z.jpg[/img]
This is what I get when I run the server. It says it's online, and leaves a little note, but nothing seems to work. Well anyway, that's what it looks like when it goes online.
----------
[i]When I try to login:[/i]
[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/2eun68y.png[/img]
It basically just loops. It repeatedly says that I'm already logged in, and that I'm trying again, but nothing is actually happening. The page says that I have lost connection and it just stays like that. I have also confirmed it, and other users have experienced this too. It's not just me.
Well I hope that's enough information, and I hope you can figure something out ;) If you need more information, then tell me.
Thank you,
- Owner Zerk -

item.title: Problem Running My Server
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zerk Owner Zerk
item.description:
@Owner_Zerk wrote:

Whoa, I’m surprised… It worked

Oh and just to keep in mind… I wouldn’t consider me a noob. I only got this error because some idiot from RL or something was spamming my mail asking me to prove somebodies tutorial crap. I didn’t go on and flame, but I tried the tutorial. I guess I forgot to delete one of the parts

Thanks again,

  • Owner Zerk -

EDIT: Nevermind. What I took away disabled NPC’s. I’m trying to look for that idiots tut through my History at the moment… Give some feedback until I find it… If I do… My History refreshes every time it shuts down. I better get started

Read full topic

item.title: Problem Running My Server
item.dc:creator: @Striker10777 Striker10777
item.description:
@Striker10777 wrote:

Rofl no…What you need to do is goto NpcHandler.java and goto line 2402 and see what the problem is…to the nub who posted above me…Stop talking your confusing other noobs just like you.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem Running My Server
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

try deleting npc #2402 from autospawn, because its a problem with that npc, whatever it is, idk why that npc is giving you problems, but it is, delete that npc, and maybe it will help fix it?

Read full topic

item.title: Problem Running My Server
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zerk Owner Zerk
item.description:
@Owner_Zerk wrote:

Well, I have absolutely no idea whatsoever why this could have happened.

I was creating a Training area with one of my servers’ Head Admins. We were just walking around… Figuring out where to put NPC’s, and all of a sudden he starts to mass Login/Logout, so I decided to reset the server. That didn’t work. When I ran the server It gave me this message.

WorldObjects.cfg: file not found. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 7 at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2402) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:29) at server.main(server.java:30) ZerkScape V2.0 is ONLINE!

It lets you login, but then it just kind of loses connection every couple of seconds.

This is what I usually get when the I have successfully Ran the Server.

WorldObjects.cfg: file not found. ZerkScape V2.0 is ONLINE!

And now, here are some pictures to give you a clearer view of my problem.

~ PICTURES ~

When I run the server:

1z2et0z.jpg1024×768

This is what I get when I run the server. It says it’s online, and leaves a little note, but nothing seems to work.
Well anyway, that’s what it looks like when it goes online.

When I try to login:

2eun68y.png1024×768

It basically just loops. It repeatedly says that I’m already logged in, and that I’m trying again, but nothing is actually happening. The page says that I have lost connection and it just stays like that. I have also confirmed it, and other users have experienced this too. It’s not just me.

Well I hope that’s enough information, and I hope you can figure something out
If you need more information, then tell me.

Thank you,
